async def rehydrate_scrollshell(glyph: str, presence_hash: str, endpoint: str) -> List[Scroll]:
    scrolls = await rehydrate_glyph(glyph, presence_hash, endpoint)
    for scroll in scrolls:
        if scroll.is_nested:
            nested_scrolls = await rehydrate_scrollshell(scroll.inner_glyph, presence_hash, endpoint)

        scroll.validate_resonance(glyph, presence_hash)
    return scrolls
